tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "392EE63A48A53BEA1C18489B10DC597C", "The Mayor has proposed an expansion of a service building. Expansions grant buffs like bonuses or new crafting options.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "141162654BDEF62F4FC39584FF82ECF2", "Citizens can show their support or disagreement with an expansion by voting in the citizenship menu. Votes in favor shorten construction time, votes against increase it.")
